title: Caterer Job Scraper
description: Scrape hospitality and catering jobs from Caterer.com. Uses hybrid Cheerio + Playwright approach (no detail visits needed).

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Caterer.com search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of Keyword/Location.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Head Chef', 'Restaurant Manager', 'Sous Chef', 'Bartender'.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search for jobs (e.g., 'London', 'Manchester', 'Birmingham'). Leave empty for all locations.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (residential recommended for Caterer.com).
proxyConfiguration.sectionDescription: Residential proxies with GB country code are strongly recommended for reliable scraping.
